document.p: This workshop offers two weeks of writing scripts that support your type design process. Many time consuming tasks can be automated. Even a script of 10 lines, that costs 2 days to script is profitable if it saves 2 weeks of repeatative work.

ul.li: Learn to use the supplied example scripts;
Analyse your current way of working. Which parts of that could be automated?
Write some scripts for those tasks by adapting the example scripts;
Learn to generalize code to be useful for future projects.

document.p: Completion of workshops Basic coding in Python #1, Basic coding in Python #1 and Coding simple scripted tools is recommended.
